attributes.action: Remove VAT on ALL registered charities supporting our armed services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a proud mother of a serving soldier from the Duke of Lancasters. My son is 18 years of age and is  posted to cyprus waiting to go to Afgan.  After recently visiting the Help for Heroes  website to offer my support  to those  fundraising for this group I  purchased some items  only to be charged  VAT. This money should be allowed to be given back to the charity or should be VAT free.So that the maximum money can go to the charity and directly support those injured or  in need of help.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
